get.description: Always returns 200. The JSON will only include the message field.
Invokes the basic availability check on the given dependency. The response code will match the code returned by the dependency, and will be omitted from the JSON.
The response JSON will contain all available diagnostic details and the results of checking the health of all dependencies.
The response JSON will contain a message and the results of checking the health of primary dependencies, although stack traces will be excluded.

HealthDto_Availability.description: Indicates the health of this service.

links.description: Contains hyperlinks to other resources for health check

name.description: The display name of the dependency

message.description: A human readable explanation of the health check status

type.description: Indicates the type of dependency, which may have additional properties of that type

HealthDependencyDto_Dependency.description: Provides information about a dependency of this service, such as an external service that it relies on.

url.description: Availability check URL of the remote dependency

status.description: HTTP status code returned by the service

HttpServiceDto_Dependency.description: Properties of the HTTP service dependency

self.description: The health endpoint within a service that can be queried for the health of this dependency

LinksDto_Dependency.description: Contains hyperlinks to other resources related to a dependency
